title: Pegging Lord Havisham: Every wild stallion needs to be broken
description: After his wife's death, Lord Havisham embarked on a destructive journey of depravity and sordid behavior. His children's young governess is caught up in his thrilling wake, enjoying intense spankings, public fisting and more. But his wicked ways are worsening fast. Fearing for what little remains of her virtue, Victoria sets out on a desperate mission to tame this wild stallion before it's too late.
author: Cecelie Hart
